card.title: Multiplayer
card.description: Create matches with your friends or join the matchmaking queue.

card.title: Ranking
card.description: Improve your ranking to reach the top of the leaderboard.

card.title: Chat rooms
card.description: Create public or private chat rooms to chat with your friends in real time.

faq.question: What is the aim of this project?
faq.answer: This is the latest project of the 42 common core, involving the creation of a multiplayer pong game web application.

faq.question: What technologies were used in this project?
faq.answer: This project was built using React and NestJS.

faq.question: Is the project open source?
faq.answer: Yes, the project is open source. You can find the GitHub repository at https://github.com/fluchtens/ft_transcendence

faq.question: Where is the data stored?
faq.answer: The website and database are hosted by OVH in Gravelines, France.
